#datahub #graphql

```toc
```

---

# graphiql
https://{your-datahub-domain}/api/graphiql

# query sample

## createPost
```graphql
mutation {
  createPost(input: {
		postType: HOME_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT
    content: {
    	contentType: TEXT
      title: "Welcome, Coinone Datahub!"
      description: """
손실된 데이터 패킷처럼 목적 없이 방황하지 않고 모든 데이터 요구 사항을 위한 one-stop-shop, Datahub 에 오신것을 환영합니다.
"""
    }
  }
}
```

```graphql
mutation {
  createPost(input: {
		postType: HOME_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT
    content: {
    	contentType: LINK
      title: "Datahub 소개와 검색 Tip"
      link: "{url link}",
      media: {
        type: IMAGE,
        location: "data:image/png;base64,"
      }
    }
  }
)
}
```

## listposting
```graphql
query listposting{
listPosts(input:{
  start: 0
})
{
  total
  posts {
    urn
    content {
      contentType
      description
      link
      title
      media {
        location
        type
      }
    }
  }
}
}
```

## deletePost
```graphql
mutation deletePost{
  deleteTest(urn: "urn:li:post:{id}")
}
```

## updateCorpUserProperties
```graphql
mutation {
  updateCorpUserProperties(
    urn: "urn:li:corpuser:??"
    input:{
      displayName: "??"
    }
  ) {
    status
    isNativeUser
  }
}
```

## createGlossaryNode
```graphql
mutation {
  createGlossaryNode(input: {
		id: "DataTier"
    name: "Data Tier"
  })
}
```
